sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO board1( unq , title , pass , name , content , rdate) VALUES( board1_seq.nextval , #title# , #pass# , #name# , #content# , sysdate)
sqlMap.select:
SELECT B.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* from( SELECT UNQ , TITLE , NAME , HITS , to_char(RDATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') RDATE FROM BOARD1 ORDER BY unq desc) A ) B
WHERE RN >= $startno$ AND RN <= $endno$
SELECT UNQ , TITLE , NAME , CONTENT , to_char(RDATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') RDATE FROM BOARD1 WHERE UNQ = #unq#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE BOARD1 SET HITS=HITS+1 WHERE UNQ = #unq#
sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD1 WHERE UNQ = #unq# AND PASS = #pass#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO REBOARD( unq , title , pass , name , content , rdate , fid , thread) VALUES( reboard_seq.nextval , #title# , #pass# , #name# , #content# , sysdate , (select nvl(max(fid), 0) + 1 from reboard) , 'a' )
sqlMap.select: SELECT UNQ , TITLE , NAME , HITS , to_char(RDATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') RDATE FROM reboard ORDER BY UNQ DESC
